answerText: Alabama Crimson Tide[10] In 2009, this current Saints running back became the first Heisman trophy winner from the University of Alabama. He helped Alabama win the 2010 BCS Championship over Texas.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 15 | 17 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: This football team beat Gene Chizik's Auburn Tigers 21-0 in the 2012 BCS Championship Bowl Game at the Superdome in New Orleans. For 10 points each: [10] Name this SEC football team that is often cheered for with the phrase "roll tide."
